properties.areaDesc: Haralson; Paulding; Carroll; Polk; Bartow; Floyd
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 4:51AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
At 450 AM EST...a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line
extending from near Etna to Roselle...and moving northeast at 80 mph.

HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and heavy rain.

IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light...unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary
street flooding especially in poor drainage areas.

Some locations in the path of these storms include
Rome, Carrollton, Cedartown, Buchanan, Bremen, Rockmart, Euharlee,
Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Aragon, Cave Spring, Kingston, Waco,
Taylorsville, Esom Hill, John Tanner State Park, Blackjack Mountain,
Fish Creek and Etna.
properties.instruction:
People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should
slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to
hydroplaning.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR POLK...HARALSON...SOUTHWESTERN BARTOW...SOUTHWESTERN CARROLL...WESTERN PAULDING AND SOUTHERN FLOYD COUNTIES UNTIL 515 AM EST
